import React from "react"; import CheckoutSteps from "../components/CheckoutSteps"; import {useSelector} from "react-redux"; import {Link, Navigate} from "react-router-dom"; export function PlaceOrderScreen(props) { const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart); const toPrice = (num) => Number(num.toFixed(2)); cart.itemsPrice = toPrice() return (
{!cart.paymentMethod && }

  • Shipping

    Name: {cart.shippingAddress.fullName}
    Address: {cart.shippingAddress.address}, {cart.shippingAddress.city}, {cart.shippingAddress.postalCode}, {cart.shippingAddress.country}

  • Payment

    Method: {cart.paymentMethod}

  • Order Items

      { cart.cartItems.map((item) => (
    • {item.name}
      ${item.qty} x ${item.price} = ${item.qty * item.price}
      • )) }
) }
